name: Hurdles!
description:
Hurdles! is Jump Force game, a fast-paced endless side-scrolling runner game where the player needs to time jumps over oncoming obstacles to avoid crashing.

This game is the result of my course project as a software engineer from Telkom University. The original game assets are available at https://lewisstephens.itch.io/

I really hope you will enjoy this game and would love to hear any kind of feedback!

Controls: Space - jump
